name: getAppointmentStatus
description: This API call is used to get all the available status that can be assigned to an appointment.

parameters.name: statusType
parameters.description:
0 => Mandatory Status [ Can't be modified nor deleted ]
1 => System Status [ Can only be enabled or disabled only ]
2 => Custom Status [ Can be Modifeid or enabled/disabled ]
If empty all the available status will be returned
